3: But I promised to not use your tear.
Where there is a will, there is a way.
As long as I keep seeking, there must be another solution.
You are right, but I can't make any use out of this tear.
At least take this drop. Just take it as a token of appreciation from me.
But Master told me to always keep my promise.
You also promised old panda to bring my tear back, didn't you?
Take it. The one you want to save must be important to you. I'd like to help you out.
Before Pulao can react, Big Fish quickly puts the tear in her water bottle and returns it to her hand.
Alright, don't waste your time here. Stop arguing and go back to those who need you.
Here, take my contact. You can come to me anytime if you need a listener.
That's my way of thanking you!
Haha, no problem. All the best.
